entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. Temperature rising to 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or a few thunderstorms changing to rain showers at times heavy this evening and ending before morning then clearing. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to 12 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to plus 3 in the morning then rising.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to plus 3 in the morning then rising. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
